title: Abnormal behavior: a mental hospital (TEFC)
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychiatric hospital care
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Schizophrenia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Schizophrenics - Rehabilitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness - Treatment
description: A series of doctor-patient interviews acquaint the viewer with the symptomatology of various types of schizophrenic disturbances. In an unusual sequence, a patient with paranoid tendencies is shown undergoing electro-convulsive therapy. The director of the hospital tells of the hospital's goals in this and other forms of treatment.
